title: Interpretation of a dream about a garbage bag according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a garbage bag in a dream means forbidden money and means envy and other interpretations. We will explain this to a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, such as dreaming of a black garbage bag. Or collecting garbage or trash can garbage cart for Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others In continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a garbage bag in a dream Seeing a garbage bag in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has a strong will to take care of his health, which is one of the important things in a person’s life in general. Seeing garbage bags in a dream also indicates that he will neglect his health and suffer from diseases and will lose many of his physical abilities in the near future and will suffer from many different things. Seeing garbage bags in a man’s dream is evidence that he will obtain impure money coming from a forbidden source, and the great sins he commits. Seeing a garbage bag in front of the house in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is jealous of all people and does not care at all about what is in his hand. The presence of garbage bags in front of the house in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will cause a lot of harm to people close to him in public life. Interpretation of throwing a garbage bag in a dream Throwing garbage in a dream For singles, there are indications that he will get rid of the distress, anxiety and fears that he goes through in public life and will also succeed in achieving happiness and peace of mind. Throwing garbage in a person’s dream also indicates that he will be able to Achieving many successes in his life and will earn well. Seeing a single person with garbage bags stacked strangely on top of each other in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will repent and stay away from sin. Interpretation of garbage in the house in a dream Seeing garbage in the house in a dream is evidence of the financial blessing that he will soon obtain, but he will not keep it in public life. As is evident from seeing garbage in the house in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer spends money on goods that he does not need in public life and needs to get back on track and keep his money in life so that he does not stray from spending lavishly. Seeing garbage in a dream, and it was in a place other than its known place in the house, is evidence of the dreamer's decline and his largely man-made ideas. Seeing the dreamer pick up all the garbage in the rooms of the house and put it in a bag and throw it away by throwing it outside the house, and this is evidence of the dreamer's health improving and it will be good soon, because he will get. A lot of money. As is evident from picking up garbage from the house and throwing it away in a dream, this is evidence that he will be able to get rid of bad friends in the near future. Interpretation of garbage in front of the house in a dream If an unmarried woman sees that she is at home and finds a large garbage bag in front of the house, this is evidence that she is suffering from various obstacles in her public life. The presence of garbage in front of the house in a dream also indicates that he will face some big problems in public life and will also face friends

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband courting his wife according to Ibn Sirin and senior scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband flirting with his wife: seeing the dreamer in a dream because he is flirting with his wife is a sign of kindness and good news that will come to them soon and the great love that unites them. The vision is a sign of profits and success that the couple will achieve. In the future and in the following article, we will learn in detail all the interpretations of this topic. Interpretation of a dream about a husband who is flirting with his wife. A husband caressing his wife in a dream is a sign of stability in life and abundant goodness that will come to her soon, God willing. Seeing a husband in a dream with his wife as he is flirting with her shows the great love that exists between them. Seeing A dreamer in a dream caresses his wife indicates overcoming the problems and crises that the dreamer has been suffering from for a long time. Seeing a dreamer caressing his wife in a dream indicates the high status that he will soon acquire and the abundant money that he will acquire. Interpretation of a dream of a husband flirting with his wife in Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that Seeing a husband caressing his wife in a dream is a sign of the happy life that the dreamer is living. Seeing someone in a dream caressing his wife shows great love and support for each other in reality. Seeing a husband in a dream because he is flirting with his wife indicates a high status and a serious job that he will get soon. The dreamer’s vision Caressing his wife in a dream symbolizes paying off debts and relieving distress and anxiety as soon as possible, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a husband flirting with his wife in Nabulsi. The Nabulsi scholar explained seeing a husband in a dream caressing his wife, to ensure that their lives will be stable and free of trouble during this period, thanks to God. Also Seeing a husband in a dream flirting with his wife means that she is fully responsible for her home and does not leave them behind. A man’s dream of flirting with his wife is evidence of wealth and abundance of money that will come to him in the fastest time, God willing. Seeing a dreamer flirting with his wife in a dream is a sign of getting rid of The problems that existed between them for a period of time. Interpretation of a dream about a husband flirting with his wife according to Ibn Shaheen. The scholar Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dreamer’s dream about caressing his wife as a sign of happiness and good news that the couple will hear soon. Seeing a dreamer caressing his wife in a dream indicates a high status that the dreamer will soon acquire. A person in a dream with a husband who is flirting with his wife means that he will achieve the goals and aspirations that he has been striving for for a period of time. Interpretation of a dream about a husband who is flirting with his wife for a married woman: A married woman’s dream about flirting with her husband in a dream portends a stable life and an abundance of goodness that will come to her soon, God willing. Seeing a husband in Dreaming that he is flirting with his wife is a sign that he will soon have a long-awaited child. Seeing the dreamer in a dream because her husband is flirting with her is a sign of abundance of money and success in business. Seeing a wife in a dream because her husband is flirting with her means that you will overcome the problems and crises that you are facing. Interpretation of a dream A husband who flirts with his pregnant wife. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream because her husband is flirting with her is evidence that her pregnancy is stable and that she does not suffer from pain, thank God. Seeing a pregnant woman in pregnancy

title: Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Fruit in a dream. It is worth noting that seeing fruit in a dream is considered one of the good visions that carry many positive meanings and connotations and vary based on the social and psychological state of the viewer and many interpretive scholars who have tried to do so. Explain the meanings of these dreams that indicate goodness, living and happiness, and in this article we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing fruits in a dream. Fruits in a dream for a married woman, as seeing fruits in a married woman’s dream is considered a good and good vision in its meanings and implications, especially as it indicates a happy and stable married life. And other connotations, and in this context we learn their interpretation. Seeing fruit in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is eating fruit. This dream is evidence that he will achieve the desire he wants to reach. Moreover, if a married woman dreams that she is eating fruit Rotten. This dream is evidence that this woman will face many problems and problems in the coming period of her life. Likewise if the woman is seen offering fruit to her husband. This dream is a sign of her husband’s new job or that he will get a promotion at work. Likewise if a married woman sees She herself is eating fruit from her husband’s hand. This dream will be evidence of her love and appreciation for marriage. See also: Interpretation of a dream of watching television for a single and married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Buying fruit in a dream for a single woman... Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dream, as seeing fruit in a dream is one of the visions that It includes many interpretations, as these interpretations differ based on the details that appear in the dream, as buying it is one of the promising visions, and in this context it will tell you the explanation of the interpretation. From the vision of buying fruit in a dream for a single woman is also: According to Al-Nabulsi: If a girl sees the fruit in a dream. This vision is good news for this girl to get married soon. Likewise, if you see fruits in a dream, this is an indication of what the dreamer hears about the happy news that It brings goodness to her, and God is Most High and knows that. Likewise, seeing fruits scattered in a dream over the head of an unmarried woman. It is a symbol of the good conduct and righteousness that this girl enjoys at the same time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about jinn and demons in a dream by Ibn Sirin Its meaning in detail is the interpretation of seeing red fruits in a dream, as seeing the fruit differs in the interpretations it contains, and this depends on the type of fruit, as well as its color, and what is the individual’s situation regarding this dream, and many interpretation scholars who have tried to clarify the concepts of these dreams and in the context of the paragraph we explain the interpretation of the vision of red fruits In a dream it is also: It should be noted that seeing red fruits in a dream belongs to a married woman. It is evidence of an imminent new pregnancy. But seeing red fruits in a pregnant woman’s dream. It is evidence of nourishing the baby girl who will grow into a beautiful girl. Also, if one sees In the dream, the fruit is red in color. This dream is indicative

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman giving the call to prayer in a dream

preview.html: If a woman sees herself calling to prayer in a dream, and she is reassured, this indicates her obedience to God Almighty, and this vision also shows that she enjoys a great position among all members of her family, and if she sees that she is calling to work, this indicates her promotion, and the following is its interpretation. Ibn Shirin to see a woman calling to prayer in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a woman calling to prayer in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream a woman calling to prayer, this indicates the abundance of heresies and temptations in society. If a woman sees herself calling to prayer in a dream, this indicates her piety and closeness to God Almighty. If a woman dreams that she is calling for prayer, this indicates the high status she will reach in the coming period. If a woman sees that she made a mistake in calling, this indicates injustice to the woman in the vision. Interpretation of seeing someone calling for prayer in a dream. If one sees that he is making a call In a dream while he is in his prison, it means that he will be released and his suffering will end. If you see someone calling for prayer on his bed in a dream, this indicates his imminent death. If you see the enemy calling for prayer in a dream, this indicates that secrets will be revealed during This time. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for a married woman in a dream. Seeing a married woman listening to the call to prayer in a dream indicates stability in life. If a married woman sees that she heard the call to prayer in a dream, this means that she will be freed from problems and fears. But if she sees that she hears the call to prayer in her dream, this It indicates that the situation has improved a lot. To see hearing the call to prayer at home in a married woman’s dream, this indicates the death of a family member. Interpretation of seeing crying when hearing the call to prayer in a dream When you see a man crying while hearing the call, this indicates repentance from sins and disobedience. Crying when hearing the call to prayer The call to prayer in a dream indicates piety and good circumstances. However, if he sees that he is crying while hearing the call in his dream, this indicates the positive takbirs that occur in his life. Seeing someone crying in his dream when he hears the call to prayer shows the things that will happen in his life. Interpretation of seeing the call to dawn in Dream: If he sees in a dream that he is calling for dawn, this indicates the fulfillment of desires to a large extent. If an unmarried girl sees that she hears the call of dawn in her dream, this indicates her marriage to a righteous man. As for seeing dawn in a dream, it indicates distance from failure in Life. But if he sees in a dream that he hears the dawn call to prayer, this indicates success. Interpretation of seeing the call to the Maghrib prayer in a dream. Seeing the Moroccan call to prayer in a dream means reaching a high position. As for whoever sees in his dream that he hears the call to the Maghrib prayer, this indicates the occurrence of new things in His life. If a girl sees herself praying after hearing the call to the Maghrib prayer in a dream, this indicates performing the Hajj or Umrah obligation. If a married woman sees that she hears the call to the Maghrib prayer in a dream, this means that she will have children and money. Interpretation of seeing a drunk woman in Dream: If a woman sees that she is drunk in a dream, then...

title: Interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream, what is the symbol of a dream about the Virgin Mary, the meanings of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream, and seeing the unmarried, married, and pregnant Virgin Mary in a dream, the Virgin? Mary, the mother of the Messenger of God Jesus, is one of the women mentioned in the Book of God Almighty. Location of the vision. Interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream portends good nutrition and abundance. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream indicates wisdom, prudence, and prudence. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems. Seeing the Virgin Mary, peace be upon her, in a dream indicates wealth. After poverty and ease after hardship. Interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream by Ibn ShaheenSeeing the Virgin Mary in a dream indicates the viewer’s ability to earn a living. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream It indicates the collapse of adversities and worries. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream It indicates the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and His blessings, Which makes him always in God’s care. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream is a reminder of the good news of procreation for those who delayed childbearing. Interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream according to Nablus. Seeing the Virgin in a dream according to Al-Raed is a statement of the viewer’s commitment to his religion and his closeness to God Almighty. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream indicates the marriage of unmarried and unmarried women to someone Or a pious girl. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream means the end of worries and problems and the beginning of a new life free of crises. Interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the Virgin Mary in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her short marriage to a good man. Seeing Mrs. Mary in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates On the good morals and good behavior of a girl. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a single woman’s dream indicates achieving the goals that the girl seeks to achieve. Interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her dream, the Virgin Mary, shows that she will be blessed with offspring soon. Seeing a married woman in her dream, the Virgin Mary, indicates To the vision’s commitment to performing her worship to the fullest. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a married dream indicates the fulfillment of her desires and dreams. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream indicates the stability of her married life. Seeing a woman married to the Virgin Mary in a dream indicates abstaining from sin and abandoning sins. Interpretation of a vision The Virgin in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the pregnant Lady of Panagia in a dream. Roga indicates the seeds of righteousness and piety. Seeing the pregnant Lady Mary in a dream indicates comfort after hardship and the end of worries and sorrows. Seeing the Virgin in a pregnant dream indicates the ease of her birth and the life of a healthy child. Interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream for a man. The Virgin Mary in a dream for a man indicates the abundance of his livelihood and the goodness that he obtains. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for a man expresses the intensity of his love and attachment to his wife. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream denotes married if she is not married. We are happy to see the reception of your dream about “Interpretation of seeing the Virgin”, through Comments, and the dream team will interpret a solution

title: Interpretation of ghee in a dream for single women, pregnant women, married women, and different situations

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of ghee in a dream for single women, pregnant women, married and divorced women, and men in good and bad situations, as ghee and fatty substances in general are considered among the most used materials in preparing food, and when many people dream about them, they do not know the true meaning of their dream, and this can cause strife, anguish, and anxiety. Ghee is one of the things that scholars differ in interpreting when it appears in a dream, as the interpretation differs from that of a person. And for another according to the condition and type of the fortune teller, whether male or female, and the situation in which the mistletoe came in the dream. Many people ask, “What is the interpretation of seeing ghee in a dream detailing the good and bad for different occasions?” That is why we answer you through an encyclopedia in our article, as some are interested in the interpretations that his visions really carry, what they symbolize, and the most prominent indications that they carry in their aspects, believing that they are messages from the Lord. Interpretation of ghee in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing ghee in a dream is a sign of the abundance of money that the dreamer will receive, while butter is a sign of the fulfillment of a desire. As for consuming butter or ghee, it is a sign of the fulfillment of the aspirations and hopes that the dreamer wanted and planned. Her. If one sells butter in his dream, it means that he will receive some money. But if a man sees in his dream that he is hitting with the force of mistletoe, this is a sign of a great inheritance from the dreamer’s family. Obesity in general, so we see it in a dream, is evidence of good news. And happy, which satisfies the heart and mind. But if mistletoe in the dream enters the food, this indicates a travel opportunity that the dreamer was waiting for and even dreamed of, and this trip is the gateway to goodness through which the dreamer will achieve everything he desired and dreamed of. To see ghee in the dreamer symbolizes . Kindness is an indication of the abundance of halal supplies that God actually gives him, and God knows best. The dreamer interprets the vision of selling ghee in a dream as; The dreamer’s profit from his profession or work is small, and it is not the great gain that brings him stability in reality, and God knows best. Also, seeing ghee in the dreamer’s dream is interpreted as; Live a modest life, and God knows the unseen. Seeing tasting mistletoe in a dream indicates that he lives a comfortable and happy life in reality, where he finds enjoyment, enjoyment, and joy in his professional and social life and in his relationships with others in general, and God knows best. Seeing ghee in a dream shows the dreamer an understanding of religion, Rather, it symbolizes knowledge and its abundant acquisition in reality, and God knows best. Seeing ghee churning in a dream means that he will obtain a lot of money and allowances as a result of the inheritance he obtains in reality, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing washing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing ablution in a dream: Ablution: is washing one of the parts of the body, such as the face, hands, feet, and the like, and ablution is one of the basic conditions for performing prayer correctly. Follow us on seeing ablution in a dream. Interpretation scholars believe that whoever sees ablution in a dream for prayer leads to sincere repentance to God and refraining from committing sins and disobedience. But if the dreamer sees ablution in a dream, this indicates the extent of her personality, her good nature, and the good reputation by which she is known to people. If she sees For an unmarried girl washing in a dream, this symbolizes the imminent fulfillment of the desires and aspirations that she aspires to. If a married woman dreams of washing, this indicates the stability of the marital relationship and the bliss that she experiences with her family members. If a woman dreams that she is performing ablution with her husband, this indicates the mutual love between them. And he is one of the righteous. If the student sees ablution in a dream, this promises him great distinction and success that he will achieve soon. If the dreamer sees in a dream ablution, but without completing it, this indicates that he did well, but he will find obstacles that will stop all of this. If a man dreams of ablution In the bathroom, this symbolizes getting rid of the magic and envy that he was exposed to. Seeing ablution in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The prominent scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing ablution in a dream indicates intimate weakness, and freedom from worries and extreme anxiety. If a man sees wrong washing in a dream, this symbolizes The occurrence of major misfortunes and problems in his life. As for seeing the dreamer in a dream performing ablution and going to prayer, this indicates the good condition and security that he enjoys. Dreaming about washing in a dream symbolizes fulfilling trust, paying debts to his people, and the good reputation that the dreamer enjoys. If the dreamer sees in a dream Performing ablution without completing it, this indicates the presence of many obstacles and difficulties in her life. Seeing a woman washing with the worshipers in a dream indicates the return of one of the lost things. If the dreamer dreams that he is praying without ablution in an inappropriate place, this indicates extreme confusion and anxiety that He lives with the instability of his life. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream that he is praying without ablution, it symbolizes the suffering in her life due to the loss of one of the important things in her life. If a merchant sees in a dream that he is praying without ablution, this means losing a lot of money in his business. Seeing ablution In a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams of ablution in a mosque, this means that she will soon marry a just and suitable man. If the dreamer sees in a dream ablution without completing it, this indicates the imminent relief of her, the disappearance of sadness from her, and the stability of her life soon. If a girl dreams that she is performing ablution By washing properly, it means that she will achieve many ambitions and hopes in her life. Seeing a girl in a dream washing clothes without completing them symbolizes the many difficulties that she will face in her life. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream washing in an unclean place, this symbolizes bad relations with others and she must review herself and give up

title: The 20 most important interpretations of travel in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of travel in a dream: Seeing travel in a dream has multiple signs that often bode well and are a sign of hearing good news and happy events that the dreamer will hear soon. Seeing travel is good news for the dreamer to get rid of crises and problems. Below we will learn about the interpretations of men, women, girls and others in the following article. Interpretation of travel in a dream Seeing travel in a dream symbolizes good news and a happy life that the dreamer will live soon. Also, seeing travel in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s affairs improving for the better and the stability of his life. Seeing a trip to Abroad in a dream indicates abundant goodness that will come to the dreamer in the coming period. The dreamer’s vision of traveling symbolizes success in many matters and achieving long-desired goals. Seeing someone traveling abroad in a dream means that he wants to travel abroad. A person’s dream of traveling It is a sign that he will turn away from sins and become closer to God in the coming period. Interpretation of the trip in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of traveling in a dream as a vision indicating goodness and a sign that you will hear good news soon. Seeing the dreamer in a dream traveling outside the country It symbolizes that he will soon marry a girl with morals and religion. Seeing travel in a dream indicates for the dreamer the improvement and stability of her life in the future. Seeing travel in a dream indicates the achievement of goals and aspirations that the person has been pursuing for a long time. Traveling in a dream is a sign of abundance of sustenance and abundance of goodness. Which will come to the dreamer, God willing. What is the interpretation of singles traveling? Seeing an unmarried girl traveling in a dream indicates marriage to a person with morals and religion soon. Seeing a girl traveling abroad in a dream is a sign of improvement in her life, success in her academic life, and assuming high positions. Seeing unmarried women traveling in a dream is a sign of their liberation from the difficult life they have lived for a long time. Seeing a girl traveling in a dream symbolizes achieving goals and aspirations that she has been pursuing for a long time. Seeing unmarried women traveling in a dream is a sign of having a lot of Money and good work that you will get soon. Interpretation of a trip in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman traveling in a dream indicates a stable life and many good things that she will enjoy at this time in her life. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is traveling abroad is a sign of overcoming crises and problems. Which she has been living for a long time. A married woman’s dream of traveling abroad is a sign of the improvement of her life with her husband and of the great love that exists between them. Seeing a married woman traveling is a sign that she has a lot of money and that her husband will soon occupy high positions. Seeing a woman in a dream because she She travels symbolizes that she will soon give birth to a long-awaited child. Interpretation of a trip in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman traveling in a dream indicates the stability of life and the happiness that awaits her with the arrival of her baby.

title: Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Crown Prince in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The Crown Prince is the prince who inherits power from his father in the event of his death or abdication, and rules the state either by a set of royal decrees or constitutional laws, a situation that only monarchies deal with, but seeing the prince in a dream It is one of the most mysterious dreams that carry many different interpretations that we will tell you in the following lines, where you can see the interpretation of the dream of the Crown Prince by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the heir in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing the heir generally indicates the high status he enjoys. The owner of the vision in reality, whether in science or religion. Ibn Sirin explained that an unmarried young man seeing the prince in a dream is a good vision for him and indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. But if the dreamer is poor in reality and dreams of this vision, then this dream indicates A change in circumstances for the better and the acquisition of money, and God knows best. And if the dreamer sees that he is the prince himself in a dream and takes off his crown, then this vision is hateful and indicates his neglect of his family and his injustice to them. Interpretation of a dream about an heir for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried girl, it is seeing the prince proposing to her, This vision indicates goodness and happiness. The prince in his dream actually symbolizes a wealthy man, merchant, or business manager. If you see a prince in a dream giving her a gold ring, this vision indicates that a young man is giving her a gift, and God knows best. But if she sees the prince wearing Elegant white clothes, then this vision indicates her marriage to a reputable man who holds a prominent position, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that if an unmarried woman dreams of receiving a gift from a prince, which is a necklace, a dress, money, a bottle of perfume, or a watch, Or a key, it is a vision that symbolizes kindness and diet. . For her. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that she has become a princess means excellence and success, and this dream also indicates that you will have a new job opportunity. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is eating with the prince of food, then it is one of the visions that indicate kindness and food. Seeing the prince of a country Another in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her marriage to a foreigner, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an heir in a married woman’s dream. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, seeing a prince in a dream symbolizes her husband in reality or her son. Seeing a prince in a dream indicates high status. Which she enjoys among her family and friends, and this dream indicates success and excellence. One of the symbols of seeing a prince in a dream for a married woman is that it shows the happiness and stability of married life and the extent of her husband’s love for her. In the interpretation of this vision, it was said that a married woman saw that her daughter had become a princess, so this vision indicates On her success and superiority, as well as her marriage to a wealthy man, and God knows best. Interpretation of the Caliph in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing the heir in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the fulfillment of what she hopes will happen on earth, and this dream also indicates that his status
